data.name: XGridDataListener
desc: An instance of this interface is used by the XGridDataModel to get notifications about data model changes.
Usually you must not implement this interface yourself, but you must notify it correctly if you implement the XGridDataModel yourself

methods.name: dataChanged
desc: is called when existing data in a grid control's data model has been modified.

methods.name: rowHeadingChanged
desc: is called when the title of one or more rows changed.

methods.name: rowsInserted
desc: is called when one or more rows of data have been inserted into a grid control's data model.

methods.name: rowsRemoved
desc: is called when one or more rows of data have been removed from a grid control's data model.
